titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on yarn of carded cashmere of 19.35 metric yarn count or higher.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/19/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on yarn of carded cashmere of 19.35 metric yarn count or higher.
